verses.verse: And the men <S%H582><s%> of Kiryat-Ye`arim <S%H7157><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and fetched up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Abinadab <S%H41><s%> in the hill <S%H1389><s%>, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And it came to pass, while <S%H3117><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in Kiryat-Ye`arim <S%H7157><s%>, that the time <S%H3117><s%> was long <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; for it was twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> lamented <S%H5091><s%> <S%H8735><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, If ye do return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> with all your hearts <S%H3824><s%>, then put away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the strange <S%H5236><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%> and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> you, and prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8685><s%> your hearts <S%H3824><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him only: and he will deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> did put away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%> and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> only.

And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Gater <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8798><s%> all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%>, and I will pray <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> for you unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And they gathered together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>, and drew <S%H7579><s%> <S%H8799><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, and poured it out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and fasted <S%H6684><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>. And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%>.

And when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were gathered together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8694><s%> to Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%>, the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>. And when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, they were afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, Cease <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not to cry <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> for us, that he will save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a <S%H259><s%> sucking <S%H2461><s%> lamb <S%H2924><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> wholly <S%H3632><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> for Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and the YY <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him.

And as SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> was offering up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: but the YY <S%H3068><s%> thundered <S%H7481><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> upon the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and discomfited <S%H2000><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them; and they were smitten <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8735><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, until they came under Bethcar <S%H1033><s%>.

Then SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it between Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%> and Shen <S%H8129><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of it Ebenezer <S%H72><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Hitherto hath the YY <S%H3068><s%> helped <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us.

So the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were subdued <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was against the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>.

And the cities <S%H5892><s%> which the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were restored <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, from Ekron <S%H6138><s%> even unto Gat <S%H1661><s%>; and the coasts <S%H1366><s%> thereof did Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>. And there was peace <S%H7965><s%> between Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>.
And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life <S%H2416><s%>.

And he went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from <S%H1767><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> to year <S%H8141><s%> in circuit <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, and Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, and Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>, and judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in all those places <S%H4725><s%>.

And his return <S%H8666><s%> was to Ramah <S%H7414><s%>; for there was his house <S%H1004><s%>; and there he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and there he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
